document_data.name: Wheelbarrow
document_data.mainbody:
File:Pushcart.png|thumb|''A pushcart.'']]
Wheelbarrows were a simple sort of tool used for moving loads about. They could be used for carrying anything from loads of [[grain]] to injured people.
document_data.Description:
[[File:Pushcart.png|thumb|''A pushcart.'']]
Wheelbarrows were a simple sort of tool used for moving loads about. They could be used for carrying anything from loads of [[grain]] to injured people.
document_data.Availability: ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' offered fine [[duskwood]] wheelbarrows for sale, with a front wheel made of [[iron]] by [[Berdusk]]an wheelwrights. It could safely carry {{SI|400|lb|k|long=yes}} of cargo.
